name: Collector Swordsman
description:
Collector Swordsman is little action platformer game where you need to clear the level and collect coins!

Fight with goblins collect their coins, watch out for spikes, push stones to create new paths for yourself and move to next level by paying to villagers.

Controls:

Arrow Keys or WASD - Move

X - Attack

We are beginner game developer couple and this our first finished project. We did this game with LÖVE2D as our submission to CS50 Final project.

Follow us on Twitter

Thanks AndrewJL for music. 

Known Bugs: We had diffucult time dealing with delta time and jump feature.  Jump amount may vary according to fps. 

If you detect any error, let us know.
